title: Mantis.CSS.Hack.V2-Undetected
description:
NOTE: YOU MUST HAVE JAVA INSTALLED TO RUN THIS HACK.
Java Download: http://www.java.com/en/download/windows_xpi.jsp?locale=en&host=www.java.com:80


How to use:
NOTE: This software uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) to connect to the Master Server, your information is highly encrypted and safe from being recorded or sniffed for malicious purposes.
Start RunThis.bat to start the injecting process.

Login to steam, then login to the streamer. Start CSS when you receive the message "Successfully Connected To Master Server". Please be patient while it connects.
Due to the fact of it being an SSL server, it takes longer to connect because it must accept and verify certificates.

You MUST enter a working steam login because the injector uses the login to inject the hack into your account through our server, which makes detection highly unlikely.

Features:

  Aimbot

    * Bone Aiming
    * Bone Aiming Adjustments
    * Vector Aiming
    * Vector Aiming Adjustments
    * Aimkey 1-5
    * Aimthru on mouse1
    * Auto shoot
    * Silent Aim
    * Correct Spread
    * Correct Recoil - removed visual and normal recoil

  Bypasses & Fixes

    * sv_cheats
    * sv_consistency
    * sv_pure

  Removals

    * Particles (i.e. Smoke)
    * Flashbang
    * Shadows (LiteBrite)
    * Walls & Models

  Wall Hacks

    * Wire-frame models
    * Red-fill walls
    * Random-opaque walls (mat_proxy)
    * Reverse Depth (mat_reversedepth)

  Radar Hacks

    * Show All Players
    * Show Health Bars
    * Show Player Names
    * Show Player Trails
